events.eventDescription: Come learn about all that is going on this weekend at the opening ceremony! We'll then be following up the opening ceremony with live Q&A.
Looking for a team or extra teammates? Join us for a virtual team formation session!
Ready, set, build! You can start your projects now!

As with any project, having the right tools for the job is a key part of being successful. In this workshop, learn about version control and GitHub, essential tools that help software developers colaborate and share code. Never used GitHub before? That's totally fine! We'll take you through the basics, from creating your account, to creating a code repository, to adding code. Already somewhat familiar with GitHub? That's fine too! We'll be teaching more advanced concepts like pull requests, conventional commits, software versioning, and more! For every hacker, this workshop is a great help in competing for the "Best Use of DevOps Tools" prize!

Want to get started with building mobile apps? Join Adam McNeilly, a Google Developer Expert in Android Development and one of the GrizzHacks founders as he walks you through the basics of creating your first app in Android Studio!

Want to get started with building websites? Get a crash course of some of the many tools that can be used for web development. Never built a website before? We'll be starting with HTML and CSS to put together your first website. Already know HTML and CSS? We'll then be talking about Bootstrap and basic JavaScript to take your website to the next level. Finally, want to try a framework? We'll be wrapping up the workshop with a quick introduction to React, one of the most popular JavaScript frameworks!

events.eventName: Do You Know Your Trivia? - Kahoot Triva Challenge
events.eventDescription: Ready to test your trivia skills? Come play with the GrizzHacks team and other hackers in this fun event!
Think you've got the skills to escape our virtual puzzle room? Prove it at this session!
Feeling tired? Wake up with Zumba! Dance through a fun Zumba routine with our GrizzHacks organizers - no experience required!
Feeling hungry? So are we! Take a photo of your 3am snack food and share it with us on social media or in Slack!

events.eventName: Stretch it out in a Yoga Session
events.eventDescription: Need a stretch break? Come relax with us in a yoga session!
Meet your fellow attendees and answer some light-hearted questions here with our organizing team!

events.eventName: Fail Faster with Oakland University Credit Union
events.eventDescription: An intro to UX and UX in Hackathons: How can getting it wrong make it right? Let’s talk about user experience and a few methods you can apply to learn from your users as you go.
Don't miss out on the chance to talk and ask questions to Shaelese King from Comerica Bank!

events.eventName: Being a Successful Technology Team Member: A Tech Talk with Quicken Loans
events.eventDescription: Join the Rocket Mortgage by Quicken Loans team as we talk about the technology impact in our family of companies. Host DJ Bridges, University Relations Manager, will be speaking with Kyle Schrade, Software Engineer at Stock X, about his technology journey! You’ll walk away from this session with an understanding of our definition of a successful technology team member.
Don't miss the opportunity to meet and speak with DJ Bridges from Quicken Loans!
Come meet Tony Hamama from Dynatrace! You don't want to miss this chance to learn something new from an amazing company!
Network with our sponsoring companies in this one-of-a-kind sponsorship expo! Share your resume, ask questions, and get the inside scoop on our sponsors.

events.eventName: Amazon Engineering: A Tech Talk with Amazon
events.eventDescription: Come hear from Fletcher Liverance about working as an engineer at Amazon! This will be an exciting talk full of interesting information!

events.eventName: From Local Host to Production - A DevSecOps Journey Tech Talk with Ally
events.eventDescription: Don’t wait until the last minute to automate your builds and deployments, shift left and create secure, scalable software patterns. Join us and learn about Continuous Integration, Continuous Delivery/Deployment, Automation, Testing, Security Scanning, Monitoring, Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift, Helm, Jenkins, and more. This Tech Talk will be a combination of presentation and live demo with a healthy amount of Q&A. Prior experience with CI/CD and DevSecOps NOT necessary.
Don't miss the opportunity to meet with, speak, and ask questions to two awesome Little Caesar employees!

events.eventName: Innovation at Comerica and How We Innovate: A Tech Talk by Comerica
events.eventDescription: Learn how to innovate with Vaishali Bhatt, the VP Enterprise Architect at Comerica!

events.eventName: Paint Like Bob Ross with MLH
events.eventDescription: Wanna paint like Bob Ross? Come learn with our Major League Hacking representative, Surya!

events.eventName: Think Like a Hacker: A Tech Talk with Little Caesars
events.eventDescription: Do you like to eat pizza and think like a hacker? Then you'll love this Tech Talk given by Jason Brown of Little Caesars.
Overwhelmed? Calm your mind with a yoga session, led by a yoga enthusiast.

events.eventName: A Unique Double Feature with FCA!
events.eventDescription: In part one - beginning at 7:00pm - you'll see "How innovation is a cornerstone of FCA's culture: innovations across FCA as part of the digital transformation" by Mamatha Chamarthi - FCA CIO. In part two, watch Charlie Cross & Lucas Romero talk about "Every day is a hackathon: Innovations in Connected Vehicles at FCA".
Don't know what you'll need for your project submission tomorrow, or can't quite figure out how to do it? Attend this all-informative talk!
Meet your fellow attendees and answer some light-hearted questions here with our organizing team!
Got a marshmallow lying around? Decorate it up for GrizzHacks 5, and post it in our Slack or on our social media!
Let's play Bingo! Join us for a chance to win fame, glory, and possibly even prizes!

events.eventName: Picture Challenge - Is That a Cookie?
events.eventDescription: Make us wonder if that is really a cookie by decorating the sweet treat as best as you can! Post it in the Slack or on our social media pages to show everyone your work!
Join our team to create some excel-lance art! Show off your work in our Slack or on social media!
Hacking Ends and an initial Devpost submission with your project name, tagline, teammates, and prize categories are due!

events.eventName: Demo Video, Devpost Write Up, and Code Repo Due
events.eventDescription: Judging starts now! Make sure your final demo video, write up, and code repo are up on Devpost!
Our MLH representative Surya will show you how to capture the flag - digitally!

Come check out the top 10 project from GrizzHacks 5! We'll be showing off the top 10 projects, and inviting the top 10 teams and judges onto the live stream for some quick Q & A! If your team makes it to the top 10, at least one person (preferably the whole team) needs to join the stream to be eligable for our top 3 grand prizes.
Learn about resources to continue your hacks, and winners are announced!
